data.title: USCIS Office Closings
data.meta_description: This page contains a list of offices that are closed or have temporarily changed hours. Please check this page on the day of your appointment for any office closures or other important information.
data.text:
The San Francisco Asylum Office (Oakland) is opening to the public on May 15, 2024. This new, temporary space is located within the Dellums Federal Building in Oakland, CA, and is intended to increase the San Francisco Asylum Office’s interviewing capacity. The physical address is 1301 Clay Street, Suite 170N, Oakland, CA 94612.

The San Francisco Asylum Office’s main facility remains open and is located at 75 Hawthorne Street, 7th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94105. Beginning on or after May 15, 2024, asylum applicants may be scheduled for affirmative asylum interviews in either Oakland or San Francisco.

Please note that accessibility and other accommodation requests should be submitted to this address.
